FuncDef: This command configures the IP address of the default router for a DHCP client. Up to four IP addresses can be specified.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of the default router. This address must be unique within the subnet and specified in dotted decimal notation. Allowed values are IP addresses in the range 1.0.0.0 - 223.255.255.255 (with support of /31 subnets). Up to 4 IP addresses maximum.
